name: The Sides Of The: DIE!
description:
This game was made by me in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 GameJam where the theme was: Roll of the dice

[CONTROLS] 

Move - WASD/ Arrow Keys 

HIT LEFT - Leftclick/ J 

HIT RIGHT - Rightclick/ K

You are a little block knight, who fights endless waves of enemies on the 6 sides of a die!

Before each wave you get to roll a dice, and the outcome will determine on which side of the dice you'll be fighting on, and how many enemies you'll have to fight to get a point!

Your goal is to get a new highscore, by defeating as many waves of enemies as you can before you lose your 3 lives.

(Mine was 6 :D)
